Reaction Tester - Sharpen Your Reflexes!

Test and improve your reaction speed with this engaging Chrome extension. Perfect for quick breaks, gaming warm-ups, or anyone looking to enhance their reflexes!

ðŸŽ¯ Key Features:
- Simple, intuitive interface
- Instant reaction time feedback
- Clean, distraction-free design
- Track your progress over time

How it works:
Wait for the target to appear, then click as fast as you can! The extension measures your reaction time down to the millisecond, helping you understand and improve your reflexes.

Want more challenges? 
Visit reactiontester.com for our full web experience featuring four exciting levels:

Level 1: Warm Up
Master the basics with standard targets to establish your baseline reaction time.

Level 2: Sharp Eyes
Face the challenge of fading targets - click before they disappear!

Level 3: Quick Fingers
Test your precision with smaller targets and stricter time limits.

Level 4: Swift Hunter
The ultimate challenge - chase moving targets while avoiding distractions.

Whether you're a casual user looking to stay sharp or a competitive gamer aiming to improve, Reaction Tester is your perfect companion for developing lightning-fast reflexes!
